# [Interview #164: COT Signing Report - Jonathan Gan, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=164#2)

#### Jonathan Gan

Can a Gateway be opened horizontally?

#### Robert Jordan

(paused for 3 or 4 seconds in thought) I don't see why not.
